name: Aztec (itch)
description:
Aztec is the outcome of a two day, group game-jam I participated in during my second year of University, the theme of which was Puzzle games.

This was a fun game-jam to participate in as it gave me the opportunity to build on my limited experience with the Unreal Engine, as I usually use the Unity Engine. 

I learned a lot about using GitHub as a team and the blueprint system in UE4 during this game jam.
